original_text: These are the sons of Bilhah, which Laban gave unto Rachel his daughter, and she bare these unto Jacob: all the souls were seven.
korean_text: 이들은 라반이 그의 딸 라헬에게 준 빌하가 야곱에게 낳은 자손들이니 모두 칠 명이라

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Bilhah,
which Laban gave unto Rachel his daughter,
sentences.korean_translation: 라반이 자기 딸 라헬에게 준 자들이요,

sentences.original_text: and she bare these unto Jacob:
